pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Light Moisturiser Hydrating 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Simple Kind To Skin Hydrating Light Moisturiser is a perfect light-weight blend of active ingredients and vitamin goodness to keep your skin hydrated and nourished all day long. Mistering agents such as Pro-Vitamin B5, Vitamin E, Glycerine and Borage Seed Oil, helps to moisturise and soften the skin. As per all Simple products, no artificial perfume or colour and no harsh chemicals, so it won’t upset your skin, making it perfect for even sensitive skin. Dermatologically tested. For best results: Smooth gently into your face and neck using upward and outward movements. Use with our Kind To Skin Refreshing Facial Wash Gel. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We’ve stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare products suitable for all skin types and as our product range has grown. For over 50 years, we’ve pioneered a kinder approach to skin. In fact, it’s become something of an obsession. Over time we’ve really got to understand skin; what it does and the everyday challenges it faces. We’ve learnt that when something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Cetyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Pantolactone, Bisabolol, Sodium lactate, Lactic acid, Serine, Urea, Sorbitol, Allantoin, Sodium chloride, Potassium hydroxide, Carbomer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1,3-Diol, Mica, Titanium dioxide
